organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This project defines a standard protocol for secure authentication of dynamically attached devices, such as USB flash drives. The protocol has only an indirect relationship with data integrity/security, and does not directly address that issue.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
